name: Drunk Drunk Goose
description:
You're a goose that had a little too much fun with his friends at the mall.  Now you gotta stumble home before you get too tired.

Reach the other end of the map before the timer runs out!

Seems simple, right?

CONTROLS:

Hold Space Bar to move horizontally, and let go to move vertically.

Enter/Return key to restart.

DEVELOPMENT:

Made for the Boundless Game Jam with the prompt "One Button Only"

I made all the pixel art and vector art, music, sound design, and code myself.
If I had more time, I'd love to completely decorate the mall and make it more visual.  As it stands I think it's a really fun and addictive little game!

Enjoy!
